verses.verse: The proverbs<WH4912> of Solomon.<WH8010> A wise<WH2450> son<WH1121> makes a glad<WH8055> father;<WH1> but a foolish<WH3684> son<WH1121> brings grief<WH8424> to his mother.<WH517>
Treasures<WH214> of wickedness<WH7562> profit<WH3276> nothing,<WH6666> but righteousness delivers<WH5337> from death.<WH4194>
Yahweh<WH3068> will not allow<WH7456> the soul<WH5315> of the righteous<WH6662> to go hungry,<WH7456> but he thrusts away<WH1920> the desire<WH1942> of the wicked.<WH7563>
He becomes poor<WH7326> who works<WH6213> with a lazy<WH7423> hand,<WH3709> but the hand<WH3027> of the diligent<WH2742> brings wealth.<WH6238>
He who gathers<WH103> in summer<WH7019> is a wise<WH7919> son,<WH1121> but he who sleeps<WH7290> during the harvest<WH7105> is a son<WH1121> who causes shame.<WH954>
Blessings<WH1293> are on the head<WH7218> of the righteous,<WH6662> but violence<WH2555> covers<WH3680> the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked.<WH7563>
The memory<WH2143> of the righteous<WH6662> is blessed,<WH1293> but the name<WH8034> of the wicked<WH7563> will rot.<WH7537>
The wise<WH2450> in heart<WH3820> accept<WH3947> commandments,<WH4687> but a chattering<WH8193> fool<WH191> will fall.<WH3832>
He who walks<WH3212> blamelessly<WH8537> walks<WH3212> surely,<WH983> but he who perverts<WH6140> his ways<WH1870> will be found out.<WH3045>
One winking<WH7169> with the eye<WH5869> causes<WH5414> sorrow,<WH6094> but a chattering<WH8193> fool<WH191> will fall.<WH3832>
The mouth<WH6310> of the righteous<WH6662> is a spring<WH4726> of life,<WH2416> but violence<WH2555> covers<WH3680> the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked.<WH7563>
Hatred<WH8135> stirs up<WH5782> strife,<WH4090> but love<WH160> covers<WH3680> all wrongs.<WH6588>
Wisdom<WH2451> is found<WH4672> on the lips<WH8193> of him who has discernment,<WH995> but a rod<WH7626> is for the back<WH1460> of him who is void<WH2638> of understanding.<WH3820>
Wise<WH2450> men lay up<WH6845> knowledge,<WH1847> but the mouth<WH6310> of the foolish<WH191> is near<WH7138> ruin.<WH4288>
The rich man<WH6223>'s wealth<WH1952> is his strong<WH5797> city.<WH7151> The destruction<WH4288> of the poor<WH1800> is their poverty.<WH7389>
The labor<WH6468> of the righteous<WH6662> leads to life.<WH2416> The increase<WH8393> of the wicked<WH7563> leads to sin.<WH2403>
He is in the way<WH734> of life<WH2416> who heeds<WH8104> correction,<WH4148> but he who forsakes<WH5800> reproof<WH8433> leads others astray.<WH8582>
He who hides<WH3680> hatred<WH8135> has lying<WH8267> lips.<WH8193> He who utters<WH3318> a slander<WH1681> is a fool.<WH3684>
In the multitude<WH7230> of words<WH1697> there is no lack<WH2308> of disobedience,<WH6588> but he who restrains<WH2820> his lips<WH8193> does wisely.<WH7919>
The tongue<WH3956> of the righteous<WH6662> is like choice<WH977> silver.<WH3701> The heart<WH3820> of the wicked<WH7563> is of little worth.<WH4592>
The lips<WH8193> of the righteous<WH6662> feed<WH7462> many,<WH7227> but the foolish<WH191> die<WH4191> for lack<WH2638> of understanding.<WH3820>
Yahweh<WH3068>'s blessing<WH1293> brings wealth,<WH6238> and he adds<WH3254> no trouble to it.<WH6089>
It is a fool<WH3684>'s pleasure<WH7814> to do<WH6213> wickedness,<WH2154> but wisdom<WH2451> is a man<WH376> of understanding<WH8394>'s pleasure.
What the wicked<WH7563> fear,<WH4034> will overtake<WH935> them,<WH8378> but the desire of the righteous<WH6662> will be granted.<WH5414>
When the whirlwind<WH5492> passes,<WH5674> the wicked<WH7563> is no more;<WH6662> but the righteous stand firm<WH3247> forever.<WH5769>
As vinegar<WH2558> to the teeth,<WH8127> and as smoke<WH6227> to the eyes,<WH5869> so is the sluggard<WH6102> to those who send him.<WH7971>
The fear<WH3374> of Yahweh<WH3068> prolongs<WH3254> days,<WH3117> but the years<WH8141> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be shortened.<WH7114>
The prospect<WH8431> of the righteous<WH6662> is joy,<WH8057> but the hope<WH8615> of the wicked<WH7563> will perish.<WH6>
The way<WH1870> of Yahweh<WH3068> is a stronghold<WH4581> to the upright,<WH8537> but it is a destruction<WH4288> to the workers<WH6466> of iniquity.<WH205>
The righteous<WH6662> will never<WH5769> be removed,<WH4131> but the wicked<WH7563> will not dwell<WH7931> in the land.<WH776>
The mouth<WH6310> of the righteous<WH6662> brings forth<WH5107> wisdom,<WH2451> but the perverse<WH8419> tongue<WH3956> will be cut off.<WH3772>
The lips<WH8193> of the righteous<WH6662> know<WH3045> what is acceptable,<WH7522> but the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked<WH7563> is perverse.<WH8419>
